ing: 15 gummy worm candies, or to taste
des: "I have enjoyed this year after year every Halloween since 5th grade. You can have this yummy treat anytime you have a chocolate craving. A great kid friendly Halloween party snack!"
ins:
Stir chocolate pudding and whipped cream together in a bowl. Add about 10 gummy worms.
Divide chocolate ice cream between 5 bowls. Spoon chocolate pudding over ice cream and top each with sprinkles and remaining gummy worms.
